traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The crab can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The crab makes two Claw attacks and one Stinger attack.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape DC 16). The crab has four claws, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Stinger
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 22 (3d10 + 6 damage) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or have the {@condition poisoned} and {@condition paralyzed} conditions for 1 minute. The affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending both the {@condition poisoned} and {@condition paralyzed} conditions on itself on a success.

actions.name: Water Jet {@recharge 5}
entries: The crab exhales water in a 150-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 (6d8 damage) bludgeoning damage, is pushed up to 30 feet from the crab, and has the {@condition prone} condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.
